response.original_title: Journeys to the Edge of Creation The Milky Way & Beyond
response.overview: Imagine a "sea" of 200 billion stars. That's our Milky Way, one of the most brilliant and beautiful of God's creations. Travel deep inside to its very core. Experience its pulsars, quasars and mysterious black holes as captured exclusively for NASA by the orbiting Hubble space telescope. Marvel at the order of it all. The grand design. Only the Master Planner could have created it with such precision and loving care.
response.title: Journeys to the Edge of Creation The Milky Way & Beyond
